title: Lae'zel
tags: where to find laezel in bg3
how to romance laezel in bg3
content: Enemy: Defeat yourself in the Gauntlet of Shar's mirror trial. Masterful Execution: Kill any of the bosses in and around the Shadow-Cursed Lands in a single round of combat. Notched Armor: Show off your prowess to the bugbear merchant. Realities of War: Tell Arabella what happened to her parents. Return to Sender: Kill the orthon, returning him to Raphael. Shield of the Moon: Obtain Selûne's blessing from Isobel. Soldier of Fortune: Give Nightsong to Ketheric. (or Allow Balthazar to transport N
